column6:
"BARRACUDA",2006,6
Frank Castle has definitely seen better days. Beaten to within an inch of his life, then handcuffed and tossed into the Deep Blue Sea, he's got a Great White bearing down on him. If he's going to survive, he's going to have to think quick. And then he's got to worry about who's waiting for him on the surface: The Barracuda. And he can't wait for Round Two. Part 4 (of 6).
32 PGS./MAX - Explicit Content ...$2.99
